bugs.description: SafeHtmlPipe blindly trusts and passes through arbitrary HTML by using DomSanitizer.bypassSecurityTrustHtml without performing any validation or sanitization. If any untrusted user input is passed through this pipe, it will be rendered in the DOM and can lead to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities.

SafeHtmlPipe blindly trusts and passes through arbitrary HTML by calling DomSanitizer.bypassSecurityTrustHtml() directly. If any untrusted user data flows through this pipe it will be inserted into the DOM without sanitisation, leading to a high-severity reflected/stored XSS vulnerability.
